languages.text: "Согласен. Все, имеющее какое-либо отношение к творившемуся здесь святотатству, должно быть уничтожено. До последнего осколка. До последнего участника".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Согласен с господином арбитром. Все, имеющее какое-либо отношение к творившемуся здесь святоатству, должно быть уничтожено. До последнего осколка. До последнего... участника".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."
languages.original_text: "Согласен. Все, имеющее какое-либо отношение к творившемуся здесь святотатству, должно быть уничтожено. До последнего осколка. До последнего участника".

traits.locale_text: "Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed to the last fragment — and to the last participant."
"Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed to the last fragment — and to the last participant."
"Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."

"Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."
"Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."

languages.text: "Einverstanden. Alles, was auch nur entfernt mit der Ketzerei zu tun hat, die hier begangen wurde, muss bis zum letzten Fragment zerstört werden – und bis zum letzten Teilnehmer."
languages.original_text: "Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."

traits.locale_text: "Einverstanden. Alles, was auch nur entfernt mit der Ketzerei zu tun hat, die hier begangen wurde, muss bis zum letzten Fragment zerstört werden – und bis zum letzten Teilnehmer."

languages.text: « Je suis d'accord. Tout élément ayant trait à l'hérésie qui a été commise ici doit être entièrement détruit. Cela vaut également pour chacun des participants. »
languages.original_text: "Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis d'accord. Tout élément ayant trait à l'hérésie qui a été commise ici doit être entièrement détruit. Cela vaut également pour chacun des participants. »

languages.text: “我同意。与这些异端恶行相关的东西，哪怕只有一丁点联系，也必须彻底摧毁，一点点碎片都不能留下。所有参与其中的人，也必须彻底处理掉。”
languages.original_text: "Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."

traits.locale_text: “我同意。与这些异端恶行相关的东西，哪怕只有一丁点联系，也必须彻底摧毁，一点点碎片都不能留下。所有参与其中的人，也必须彻底处理掉。”

languages.text: «Estoy de acuerdo. Todo lo que esté remotamente vinculado a la herejía que se ha cometido aquí debe ser destruido, hasta el último fragmento... y el último partícipe».
languages.original_text: "Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy de acuerdo. Todo lo que esté remotamente vinculado a la herejía que se ha cometido aquí debe ser destruido, hasta el último fragmento... y el último partícipe».

languages.text: 「同意する。ここで犯された異端に少しでも関係するものは、最後の破片に至るまで、そして最後の関係者に至るまで徹底的に破壊されなければならない」
languages.original_text: "Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."

traits.locale_text: 「同意する。ここで犯された異端に少しでも関係するものは、最後の破片に至るまで、そして最後の関係者に至るまで徹底的に破壊されなければならない」

languages.text: "Katılıyorum. Burada işlenen kâfirlikle uzaktan yakından ilgili olan her şey, son parçasına ve son katılımcısına kadar yok edilmelidir."
languages.original_text: "Agreed. Anything even remotely connected to the heresy that was committed here must be destroyed down to the last fragment — and to the last participant."

traits.locale_text: "Katılıyorum. Burada işlenen kâfirlikle uzaktan yakından ilgili olan her şey, son parçasına ve son katılımcısına kadar yok edilmelidir."
